Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Add tileset data from an image source (tileset is a collections tileset).

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: setDataTexture(_:texture:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Set(replace) the texture for a given tile id.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: contains(globalID:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns true if the tileset contains the global ID.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(globalID:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tile data for the given global tile ID.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(localID:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tile data for the given local tile ID.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(withProperty:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tile data with the given property.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(ofType:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tile data with the given type.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(withProperty:_:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tile data with the given property.

Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLocalID(forGlobalID:)
Classes/SKTileset.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Convert a global ID to the tileset’s local ID.

Classes/SKTilemap/TilemapOrientation.htm.name: alignmentHint
Classes/SKTilemap/TilemapOrientation.htm.abstract: Hint for aligning tiles within each layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: url
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: File path.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: uuid
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Unique id.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tiledversion
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Tiled application version.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: size
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Size of map (in tiles).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileSize
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Tile size (in pixels).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: orientation
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Map orientation type.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: renderQuality
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Scaling value for text objects, etc.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: allowZoom
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Allow camera zoom.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: allowMovement
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Allow camera movement.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: minZoom
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Minimum zoom level for the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: maxZoom
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Mximum zoom level for the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: ignoreProperties
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Ignore custom properties.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tilesets
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Current tilesets.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: layerCount
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Layer count.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: zDeltaForLayers
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Default z-position range between layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: layers
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a flattened array of child layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: ignoreBackground
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Ignore Tiled background color.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: backgroundColor
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Optional background color (read from the Tiled file)

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: debugDrawOptions
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Debug visualization options.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: overlayColor
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Overlay color.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: gravity
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: dynamics

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: delegate
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Weak reference to SKTilemapDelegate delegate

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: focusObjects
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Objects under the mouse cursor.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: frame
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Map frame.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getVertices()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Object vertices.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: sizeInPoints
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Size of the map in points.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: lastGID
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns the last GID for all of the tilesets.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: lastIndex
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns the last index for all tilesets.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: lastZPosition
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns the last (highest) z-position in the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileOverlap
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Tile overlap amount. 1 is typically a good value.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: showObjects
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Global property to show/hide all SKTileObject objects.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: showObjects(forLayers:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Show objects for the given layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileLayers(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return all tile layers. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectGroups(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return all object groups. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: imageLayers(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return all image layers. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: groupLayers(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return all group layers. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: groupLayers
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Convenience property to return all group layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: antialiasLines
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Global antialiasing of lines

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileCount
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Global tile count

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: isPaused
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Pauses the node, and colors all of its children darker.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: load(tmxFile:inDirectory:delegate:withTilesets:ignoreProperties:loggingLevel:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Load a Tiled tmx file and return a new SKTilemap object. Returns nil if there is a parsing error.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: init(attributes:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Initialize with dictionary attributes from xml parser.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: init(_:_:_:_:orientation:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Initialize with map size/tile size

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: addTileset(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Add a tileset to tilesets set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: removeTileset(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Remove a tileset from the tilesets set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileset(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a named tileset from the tilesets set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileset(fileNamed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an external tileset with a given filename.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: pointForCoordinate(vec2:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a tile coordinate for a given vector_int2 coordinate.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: coordinateForPoint(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a tile coordinate for a given point in the layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayers(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an array of child layers, sorted by index (first is lowest, last is highest).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getContentLayers()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns all content layers (ie. not groups). Sorted by zPosition in scene.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: layerNames()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an array of layer names.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: addLayer(_:group:clamped:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Add a layer to the current layers set. Automatically sets zPosition based on the SKTilemap.zDeltaForLayers property. If the group argument is not nil, layer will be added to the group instead.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: removeLayer(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Remove a layer from the current layers set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: newTileLayer(named:group:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Create and add a new tile layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: newObjectGroup(named:group:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Create and add a new object group.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: newImageLayer(named:group:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Create and add a new image layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: newGroupLayer(named:group:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Create and add a new group layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayers(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return layers matching the given name.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayers(withPrefix:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return layers with names matching the given prefix.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayers(atPath:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return layers at the given path.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayer(withID:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a layer matching the given UUID.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a layer given the index (0 being the lowest).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayers(ofType:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return layers assigned a custom type property.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileLayers(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tile layers matching the given name. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileLayers(withPrefix:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tile layers with names matching the given prefix. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a tile layer at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectGroups(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return object groups matching the given name. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectGroups(withPrefix:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return object groups with names matching the given prefix. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectGroup(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an object group at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: imageLayers(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return image layers matching the given name. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: imageLayers(withPrefix:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return image layers with names matching the given prefix. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: imageLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an image layer at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: groupLayers(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return group layers matching the given name. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: groupLayers(withPrefix:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return group layers with names matching the given prefix. If recursive is false, only returns top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: groupLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an group layer at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: sortLayers(from:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Sort the layers in z based on a starting value (defaults to the current zPosition).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tilesAt(coord:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tiles at the given coordinate (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tilesAt(_:_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tiles at the given coordinate (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileAt(coord:inLayer:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a tile at the given coordinate from a layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileAt(_:_:inLayer:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a tile at the given coordinate from a layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTiles(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns all tiles in the map. If recursive is false, only returns tiles from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTiles(ofType:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tiles with a property of the given type. If recursive is false, only returns tiles from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTiles(globalID:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tiles with the given global id. If recursive is false, only returns tiles from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTilesWithProperty(_:_:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns tiles with a property of the given type & value. If recursive is false, only returns tiles from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: animatedTiles(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an array of all animated tile objects.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: firstTileAt(coord:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return the top-most tile at the given coordinate.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(globalID:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns data for a global tile id.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(ofType:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tile data with a property of the given type.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(withProperty:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tile data with a property of the given type (all tilesets).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getTileData(withProperty:_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tile data with a property of the given type (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectsAt(point:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return obejects at the given point (all object groups).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getObjects(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return all of the current tile objects. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getObjects(ofType:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return objects matching a given type. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getObjects(named:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return objects matching a given name. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getObjects(withText:recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return objects with the given text value. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getObject(withID:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an object with the given id.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileObjects(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return objects with a tile id. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: textObjects(recursive:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return text objects. If recursive is false, only returns objects from top-level layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/touchLocation(_:.name: touchLocation(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/touchLocation(_:.abstract: Returns a touch location in negative-y space.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/coordinateAtTouc.name: coordinateAtTouchLocation(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/coordinateAtTouc.abstract: Returns the tile coordinate at a touch location.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: mouseLocation(event:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a mouse event location in the default layer. (negative-y space).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: coordinateAtMouseEvent(event:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns the tile coordinate at a mouse event location.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: didFinishParsing(timeStarted:tasks:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Called when parser has finished reading the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: didFinishRendering(timeStarted:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Called when parser has finished rendering the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: update(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Update the map as each frame is rendered.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: gridGraphForLayers(_:walkable:obstacle:diagonalsAllowed:nodeClass:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Initialize the grid graph with an array of walkable tiles.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: parseProperties(completion:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Parse properties from the Tiled TMX file.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: mapName
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: String representing the map name.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileWidth
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Current tile width value.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileHeight
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Current tile height value.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: description
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: String representation of the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: debugDescription
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Debug string representation of the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: renderableObjects()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an array of tiles/objects.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: mapStatistics(default:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Dump a summary of the current tilemap’s layer statistics.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: load(fromFile:delegate:withTilesets:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Load a Tiled tmx file and return a new SKTilemap object. Returns nil if there is a problem reading the file

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: allLayers()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns an array of all child layers, sorted by index (first is lowest, last is highest).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: getLayer(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a named tile layer from the layers set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: tileLayer(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a named tile layer if it exists, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: objectGroup(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Returns a named object group if it exists, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: debugLayers(reverse:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Output a summary of the current scenes layer data.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.name: renderableObjectsAt(point:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:7SKTiled9SKTil.abstract: Return tiles & objects at the given point in the map.

Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.name: sceneDoubleTapped(location:)
Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the scene is double-tapped. (iOS only)

Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.name: sceneDoubleClicked(event:)
Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the scene is double-clicked. (macOS only)

Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.name: mousePositionChanged(event:)
Protocols/SKTiledSceneCameraDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the mouse moves in the scene. (macOS only)

Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:7.name: worldNode
Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:7.abstract: Root container node. Tiled assets are parented to this node.

Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:7.name: load(tmxFile:inDirectory:withTilesets:ignoreProperties:loggingLevel:)
Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:7.abstract: Load a tilemap from disk, with optional tilesets.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: didAddTileset(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Called when a tileset is added to a map.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: didAddLayer(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Called when a layer is added to a tilemap.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: didReadMap(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Called when the tilemap is finished parsing.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: didRenderMap(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Called when the tilemap layers are finished rendering.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: didAddNavigationGraph(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Called when the a navigation graph is built for a layer.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: objectForTileType(named:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Specify a custom tile object for use in tile layers.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: objectForVectorType(named:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Specify a custom object for use in object groups.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.name: objectForGraphType(named:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:7SKT.abstract: Specify a custom graph node object for use in navigation graphs.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: uuid
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Unique object id (layer & object names may not be unique).

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: hasProperties
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Returns true if the node has stored properties.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: hasKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Returns true if the node has the given property (not case sensitive).

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: stringForKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Returns a string for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: setValue(forKey:_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Sets a named property. Returns the value, or nil if it does not exist.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: removeProperty(forKey:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Remove a named property, returns the value as a string (if property exists).

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.name: propertiesString
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:7SKTiled.abstract: Returns a string representation of the node’s properties.
